heading: Reliable, Meticulous, Passionate
subheading: I'm a frontend developer who aim to craft sophisticated and purposeful websites, driven by the belief that well-leveraged technology can enhance people's everyday lives.
description:
My focus lies in creating code that is reusable, readable, and scalable as well as delving into fundamental logic, ensuring a solid understanding of the core principles which all drive me to create efficient and reliable solutions that can contribute to the long-term success of any project. 
In a team, I am a logical executor, bringing stability and coordination to drive the team forward. With my steady and meticulous style, I can bring strong commitment to delivering well-structured solutions to your technical and business goals.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce Website: Carpento
ecommerce.description: Selling furniture online, from showcasing the products, browsing the details to finishing the checkout flow.
key-points: Developed with React, CRA, Bootstrap, consisting of ~8,500 lines of well-structured source code.
Integrated with 20+ APIs, GET, POST, DELETE, and PUT to modify product and shopping cart states...etc.
Follow modular principles, including reusable component system, maintainable SCSS styling, and a clean file architecture for maintainability.
10+ reusable components and custom hooks, reduced 18% total lines of codes, enhanced code readability and maintainability.
Consolidate packages including Swiper, CKEditor, React Hook Form, enhance the readability and maintainability, also improved user experience.
ecommerce.products: Find a product, add to cart, and checkout!
ecommerce.dark-mode: Switch light / dark mode as you want!
ecommerce.blog: Add relevant contents about this brand to attract more potential customers
ecommerce.dashboard: Easily manage product, orders, blog contents, and coupons from admin dashboard.
